NK002(kha)008:0: spyan ras gzigs dpal mo lugs kyi rjes gnang gi
NK002(kha)008:1: yi ge bklags pas grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs
NK002(kha)008:3: bla ma dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)008:4: 'dir thugs rje chen po bcu cig zhal dpal mo lugs kyi rjes gnang byed par 'dod pas /
NK002(kha)008:5: dkyil 'khor pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi dbus dang phyogs bzhir zla gdan la /
NK002(kha)008:11: mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhir tshom bu ser po re rnams bkod /
NK002(kha)008:13: bum pa gnyis chas su bcug la rnam bum dkyil 'khor gyi mdun dang /
NK002(kha)008:16: chos skyong dang gzhi bdag gi gtor ma sogs gang dgos bsham /
NK002(kha)008:18: skyabs sems tshad med bzhi bsgom pa sngon tu 'gro bas /
NK002(kha)008:19: swa b+h+aa bas stong par sbyang /
NK002(kha)008:20: stong pa'i ngang las pam las pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi
NK002(kha)008:21: lte bar a las zla ba'i steng du h+r+aihyiga dkar
NK002(kha)008:23: gser gyi pad+ma'i lte bar h+r+aihs mtshan pa /
NK002(kha)008:24: de las 'od zer 'phros sangs rgyas byang sems thams
NK002(kha)008:25: cad spyan drangs nas thim pa yongs su gyur pa
NK002(kha)008:26: las / rang nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba /
NK002(kha)008:27: zhal bcu gcig gi rtsa ba'i zhal dkar ba /
NK002(kha)008:28: g.yas ljang g.yon sngo ba de'i steng gi zhal gsum ljang dmar dkar ba /
NK002(kha)008:29: de'i steng gi zhal gsum dmar dkar ljang ba /
NK002(kha)008:30: de rnams zhi zhing 'dzum la sgeg pa'i nyams can
NK002(kha)008:31: de'i steng du khro zhal nag po skra ser gyen
NK002(kha)008:32: du bardzesa pa / de'i steng du sangs rgyas 'od
NK002(kha)008:33: dpag med kyi zhal dmar po gtsug tor dang bcas
NK002(kha)008:34: du bardzesa pa / pa / rtsa ba'i phyag dang po thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba /
NK002(kha)008:36: gsum pa mchog sbyin las bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'babs pas yi dwags kyi bkres skom sel ba /
NK002(kha)008:38: g.yon gnyis pas gser gyi pad+ma /
NK002(kha)008:39: gsum pas ril ba spyi blug /
NK002(kha)008:40: bzhi pas mda' gzhu bsnams pa /
NK002(kha)008:41: phyag lhag ma dgu brgya dang dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mchog sbyin mdzad pa /
NK002(kha)008:42: phyag thams cad kyi mthil na spyan re re yod pa /
NK002(kha)008:43: zhabs mnyam pa'i stabs kyis bzhengs shing ras bzang po'i sham thabs dang /
NK002(kha)008:44: ri dwags kyi pags pas nu ma g.yon pa bkab pa /
NK002(kha)008:45: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa /
NK002(kha)008:46: mtshan dpe yongs su rdzogs pa /
NK002(kha)008:47: 'od zer dkar po 'phro ba'i sku can /
NK002(kha)008:48: de'i thugs kar pad zla'i steng du h+r+aihyiga dkar po /
NK002(kha)008:49: de las 'od zer 'phros pas rang bzhin gyi gnas
NK002(kha)008:50: dang lho phyogs po ta la nas 'phags pa spyan
NK002(kha)008:51: ras gzigs la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
NK002(kha)008:52: thams cad kyis bskor ba badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs spyan
NK002(kha)008:53: drangs la / sarba ta th+aa ga ta +aar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ar+g+ham nas /
NK002(kha)008:55: dzahmh'u bam hoh dam tshig pa dang gnyis su med par gyur pa'i dpral bar dkar po /
NK002(kha)008:57: thugs kar h'u sngon po rnams kyis mtshan par gyur /
NK002(kha)008:59: dbang gi lha rigs lnga badz+ra sa m+aa dza ar+g+ham nas /
NK002(kha)008:61: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la mngon par dbang bskur du gsol /
NK002(kha)008:63: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni /
NK002(kha)008:65: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi she ka ta sa ma ya sh+ri ye h'u /
NK002(kha)008:66: zhes dbang bskur bas sku gang /
NK002(kha)008:68: chu'i lhag ma yar lud pa las rtsa zhal mgo
NK002(kha)008:69: bo'i gnas lngar bla ma'i ngo bo 'od dpag med
NK002(kha)008:70: rigs kyi bdag por byas pa'i rigs lngas dbu brgyan
NK002(kha)008:71: par gyur / de nas bzlas pa ni /
NK002(kha)008:72: rang gi thugs kar pad zla'i steng du ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba /
NK002(kha)008:73: de'i thugs kar ting 'dzin sems dpa' h+r+aihdakara po /
NK002(kha)008:75: sems can thams cad kyi sdig sgrib sbyangs /
NK002(kha)008:77: tshur 'dus h+r+aihl thim pas h+r+aihl sngags phreng gis bskor bar mos la /
NK002(kha)008:79: na mo rat+na tra y+aa ya /
NK002(kha)008:80: na ma +aar+ya dz+ny+aa na s+aa ga ra /
NK002(kha)008:85: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga te b+h+yah ar+hada b+h+ya samyak+sam
NK002(kha)008:86: bud+d+he b+h+yah na ma +aar+ya a ba lo ki te
NK002(kha)008:87: shwa r+aa ya / bo d+d+his t+w+aa ya /
NK002(kha)008:89: ma h+aa ka ru ni k+aa ya /
NK002(kha)008:96: pra tsa le pra tsa le /
NK002(kha)008:100: tsi ti dz+aa la ma pa na ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK002(kha)008:102: tad+ya th+aa man chad cung zad bzlas nas /
NK002(kha)008:106: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum las rin po che'i snod
NK002(kha)008:107: du las mchod rdzas rnams 'phags pa kun tu bzang
NK002(kha)008:108: po'i mchod pa'i sprin lta bur nam mkha'i khams gang
NK002(kha)008:110: shab+da'i bar brjod pas byin gyis brlab /
NK002(kha)008:113: stong pa'i ngang las rang gi snying ga'i h+r+aihls b+h+r+aumhchada /
NK002(kha)008:114: mdun bskyed kyi gnas su babs pa yongs su gyur
NK002(kha)008:115: pa las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi ra
NK002(kha)008:117: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbus dang
NK002(kha)008:118: pad 'dab brgyad kyi phyogs bzhir zla ba'i gdan re
NK002(kha)008:119: re / dbus su h+r+aihyiga dkar po yongs su gyur pa las /
NK002(kha)008:120: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba /
NK002(kha)008:122: 'od zer dkar po 'phro ba'i sku can /
NK002(kha)008:123: zhes pa'i bar sngar ltar las /
NK002(kha)008:124: de'i spyi bor h+r+aihls 'od dpag med dmar po mnyam bzhag /
NK002(kha)008:125: 'dab ma bzhi'i shar du h'u las mi bskyod pa sngon po sa gnon mnyam bzhag /
NK002(kha)008:126: lhor t+r+aam las rin 'byung ser po mchog sbyin mnyam bzhag /
NK002(kha)008:127: nub tu las rnam snang dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can /
NK002(kha)008:128: byang du +aahls don grub ljang gu skyabs sbyin mnyam bzhag /
NK002(kha)008:129: lnga ka rab tu byung ba'i chas can rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
NK002(kha)008:130: mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhir bum pa bzhi 'grub par gyur /
NK002(kha)008:131: gtso bo'i thugs kar pad zla'i steng du h+r+aihdakara po /
NK002(kha)008:136: rigs bdag ni rgyas 'debs mi dgos gsungs /
NK002(kha)008:138: rab 'byams rgya mtsho dpag med ces sogs /
NK002(kha)008:139: tshigs bcad sngags dang bcas pa'am /
NK002(kha)008:141: sarba ta th+aa ga ta +aar+ya a ba lo ki
NK002(kha)008:142: te shwa ra sa pa ri b+aa ra ar+g+ham pra
NK002(kha)008:144: shab+da'i bar gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod /
NK002(kha)008:145: bstod pa spro na po bstod dam /
NK002(kha)008:147: dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi sku //
NK002(kha)008:148: 'gro drug sems can rnams la spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)008:149: nam mkha' lta bur khyab pa'i bcu gcig zhal //
NK002(kha)008:150: gzi brjid 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK002(kha)008:153: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum las rin po che'i snod
NK002(kha)008:154: du h'u las byung ba'i gtor ma bdud rtsi'i rgya
NK002(kha)008:156: lan gsum gyis byin gyis brlab /
NK002(kha)008:157: +aar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra i dam ba lin ta kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi /
NK002(kha)008:158: zhes lan gsum gyis gtor ma 'bul /
NK002(kha)008:160: skyon gyis ma gos sku mdog dkar /
NK002(kha)008:162: mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bzhes la /
NK002(kha)008:163: zhes sogs kyis 'dod don gsol ba btab /
NK002(kha)008:164: chos skyong dang zhi bdag sogs rang rang gi sngags sam /
NK002(kha)008:166: a k+aa ros bsngosa la phrin las bcol /
NK002(kha)008:167: de nas bum pa bsang sbyang /
NK002(kha)008:168: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum las rin po che'i bum
NK002(kha)008:169: pa mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam
NK002(kha)008:170: rgyal bum pa'i nang du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i
NK002(kha)008:171: dbus dang phyogs bzhir zla ba la gnas pa'i h+r+aihmh'u
NK002(kha)008:172: t+r+aam +aahls dbus su thugs rje chen po /
NK002(kha)008:173: de'i spyi bor 'od dpag med dang /
NK002(kha)008:174: phyogs kyi pad+ma 'dab bzhi la rgyal ba rigs bzhi /
NK002(kha)008:175: las bum du pad nyir h+r+aihls rta mgrin dmar po
NK002(kha)008:176: dbyug pa dang zhags pa thogs pa skad cig gis
NK002(kha)008:179: rnam bum du gzungs ring thung dang yig drug /
NK002(kha)008:184: lha 'od du zhu ba'i bum chur mos par bya'o //
NK002(kha)008:185: de ltar slob dpon gyi bya ba rnams tshar nas /
NK002(kha)008:187: sngon gtor btang zhing bgegs bskrad /
NK002(kha)008:188: las rdor gyis me tog bkye bsdu zin pa dang /
NK002(kha)008:190: 'o nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad
NK002(kha)008:191: kyi don du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang
NK002(kha)008:192: thob par bya / de'i ched du dam pa'i chos
NK002(kha)008:193: zab mo gsan snyam pa byang chub mchog tu sems
NK002(kha)008:194: thob par bya / bskyed pa dang / chos gsan
NK002(kha)008:195: pa'i kun tu spyod pa'ang mdo rgyud rnams nas ji
NK002(kha)008:196: skad gsungs pa lta gsal btab nas gsan par zhu
NK002(kha)008:197: thob par bya / bskyed pa dang / / 'dir gang gsan par bya ba'i chos ni /
NK002(kha)008:198: zhes 'brel blang ba'i chos bshad dang /
NK002(kha)008:199: brgyud pa'i lo rgyus sogs skabs babs kyi bshad pa rgyas bsdus ci rigs byas rjes /
NK002(kha)008:200: 'phags pa thugs rje chen po bcu gcig zhal dpal
NK002(kha)008:201: mo lugs kyi rjes gnang sgrub pa'i skabs su babs
NK002(kha)008:202: pa yin / de'ang gnyis las dang po rdo rje
NK002(kha)008:203: slob dpon gyi bya ba bdag bskyed sngon du btang
NK002(kha)008:204: nas mdun bskyed bsgrubs te mchod bstod gtor ma 'bul
NK002(kha)008:205: pa yin / ba dang / bum pa sgrub pa rnams yin te legs par grub nas /
NK002(kha)008:206: da gnyis pa slob ma'i bya ba la bla ma
NK002(kha)008:207: dang lhag pa'i lha dbyer ma mchis pa'i drung du
NK002(kha)008:208: rjes gnang zab mo zhu ba'i yon tu man+dala phul
NK002(kha)008:210: de ltar man+dala phul nas snyims pa me tog dang
NK002(kha)008:211: bcas pas thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba 'debs pa
NK002(kha)008:213: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
NK002(kha)008:214: lhag pa'i lha yi ngo bo nyid /
NK002(kha)008:215: dpal ldan bla ma'i bka' drin gyis /
NK002(kha)008:216: bdag la rjes gnang stsal du gsol /
NK002(kha)008:218: de nas rgyud dag par bya ba'i phyir mdun bskyed
NK002(kha)008:219: kyi lha dang sangs rgyas byang sems sprin phung 'thibs
NK002(kha)008:220: pa bzhin bzhugs pa'i drung du skyabs gsum sngon du
NK002(kha)008:221: 'gro bas byang chub kyi sems bzung snyam pas 'di'i
NK002(kha)008:222: rjes zlos mdzod / dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi /
NK002(kha)008:225: dpon slob gnyis ka'i bya ba la gnyis las /
NK002(kha)008:226: dang po rjes gnang gi gzhi 'god pa'i slad du dmigs pa 'di ltar du mdzod /
NK002(kha)008:227: swa b+h+aa ba shud+d+hahsarba d+har+m+aahswa b+h+aa ba shud+d+ho&a ham /
NK002(kha)008:229: khyed rang gi phung khams skye mched kyis mtshon pa'i
NK002(kha)008:230: phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad mi dmigs pa
NK002(kha)008:232: stong pa'i ngang las pam las pad+ma a las zla ba'i steng du h+r+aihls pad+ma h+r+aihs mtshan pa /
NK002(kha)008:233: de las 'od zer 'phros 'dus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK002(kha)008:234: khyed rang rnams 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba /
NK002(kha)008:236: 'od zer dkar po 'phro ba'i sku can /
NK002(kha)008:237: zhes pa'i bar sngar ltar las /
NK002(kha)008:240: thugs kar h'u sngon po rnams kyis mtshan pa'i mos pa mdzod /
NK002(kha)008:241: gnyis pa rjes gnang dngos gzhi la gsum las /
NK002(kha)008:242: dang po sku'i rjes gnang ni /
NK002(kha)008:243: slob dpon yang rang gis bsgoms pa dang 'dra ba'i
NK002(kha)008:244: 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dngos yin snyam pa'i
NK002(kha)008:246: slob dpon gyi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros /
NK002(kha)008:247: mdun bskyed kyi lha yi thugs rgyud bskul /
NK002(kha)008:249: phyogs bcu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rgyud bskul bas /
NK002(kha)008:250: slob dpon dang mdun bskyed kyi lha dang phyogs bcu'i
NK002(kha)008:251: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
NK002(kha)008:252: thugs ka nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'khor dang
NK002(kha)008:253: bcas pa'i sku che chung ma nges pa dpag tu
NK002(kha)008:254: med byon / khyed rang rnams kyi spyi gtsug la sogs pa'i sgo dang /
NK002(kha)008:255: ba spu'i bu ga rnams nas mtsho la char babs
NK002(kha)008:256: pa bzhin tu sib sib thim pa'i mos pa mdzod
NK002(kha)008:257: / dzahmh'u bam hohs gnyis med du bstim zhing dril
NK002(kha)008:258: bu'am ting shag 'khrol spos 'thul zhing rol mo bya
NK002(kha)008:259: / / yang slob dpon gyi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros /
NK002(kha)008:260: dbang gi lha 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rgyal ba rigs lnga badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs spyan drang /
NK002(kha)008:261: sarba ta tha ga ta ar+g+ham pra t+aits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa nas /
NK002(kha)008:263: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i dbang lha rnams la gsol ba gdab pa 'di'i rjes zlos mdzod /
NK002(kha)008:264: khyed ni mgon po thugs rje can //
NK002(kha)008:265: kun nas khyab pa'i ye shes kyis //
NK002(kha)008:266: thams cad ma lus sgrol mdzad pa //
NK002(kha)008:267: bdag sogs byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
NK002(kha)008:269: de nas las bum gyi chu 'thor zhing /
NK002(kha)008:272: rigs lnga'i thugs ka nas bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum
NK002(kha)008:273: pa bsnams pa'i yum rnams byon nas dbang bskur ba'i
NK002(kha)008:274: mos pa mdzod / bum pa spyi bor gtug cing bum chu blud la /
NK002(kha)008:275: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
NK002(kha)008:276: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar //
NK002(kha)008:277: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
NK002(kha)008:278: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bagyi'o //
NK002(kha)008:279: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi she ga ta sa ma ya sh+ri ye h'u /
NK002(kha)008:282: chu'i lhag ma yar lud pa las /
NK002(kha)008:283: spyi bo'i gtsug tu 'od dpag med /
NK002(kha)008:287: rna ltag g.yon du don grub rnams kyis dbu brgyan par bsam mo //
NK002(kha)008:288: gnyis pa gsung gi rjes gnang la lung gsum las /
NK002(kha)008:289: dang po rjes su bzlas pa'i lung blang ba'i phyir /
NK002(kha)008:290: slob dpon gyis ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar pad
NK002(kha)008:291: zla la ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' h+r+aihdakara po de
NK002(kha)008:292: las sngags kyi phreng ba byung /
NK002(kha)008:294: khyed rang rnams kyi zhal du zhugs thugs kar pad zla'i steng du h+r+aihdakara po gnas pa la thim /
NK002(kha)008:295: de'i dus su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub
NK002(kha)008:296: sems dpa' rnams kyi mkhyen brtse nus mthu thams cad
NK002(kha)008:297: 'od zer gyi rnam pa sngags phreng dang lhan cig
NK002(kha)008:298: zhal du zhugs / snying ga'i h+r+aihl thim pa'i mos
NK002(kha)008:299: pa dang bcas te sngags 'di'i rjes zlos lan gsum
NK002(kha)008:300: zhal du zhugs / mdzod / na mo rat+na t+r+aa y+aa ya sogs gzungs ring brjod /
NK002(kha)008:303: gsum pas brtan par byas pa'i mos pa mdzod /
NK002(kha)008:304: gnyis pa byin rlabs kyi lung ni /
NK002(kha)008:305: slob dpon me tog 'thor bzhin du 'di'i rjes zlos mdzod /
NK002(kha)008:306: bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis /
NK002(kha)008:307: bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol /
NK002(kha)008:309: de ltar phul ba'i me tog de nyid slar yang
NK002(kha)008:310: byin gyis rlabs te khyed rang gi spyi bor phul
NK002(kha)008:312: slob dpon gyis me tog 'thor bzhin tu /
NK002(kha)008:313: bcom ldan 'di la stsal lags kyis //
NK002(kha)008:315: brtul zhugs brtan pa mdzad du gsol //
NK002(kha)008:316: sngags kyi dngos grub stsal tu gsol //
NK002(kha)008:317: rig pa 'dzin pa 'di rnams la 'phags pa spyan
NK002(kha)008:318: ras gzigs 'khor dang bcas pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi
NK002(kha)008:319: byin rlabs ma lus pa 'jug par gyur cig /
NK002(kha)008:320: gsum pa dam baca'i lung gi phyir /
NK002(kha)008:321: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'di nyid ji srid byang
NK002(kha)008:322: chub ma thob bar gyi yi dam du bzung ngo
NK002(kha)008:323: // bdag thugs kyis ma btang zhig snyam pas 'di'i rjes zlos mdzod /
NK002(kha)008:325: bdag rig pa 'dzin pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
NK002(kha)008:326: dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid byang chub snying
NK002(kha)008:327: po la mchis kyi bar du /
NK002(kha)008:328: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'khor dang bcas pa yi
NK002(kha)008:329: dam gyi lhar bzung nas 'di'i gsang sngags ci nus
NK002(kha)008:330: re bzla bar dam 'cha' ba lags so //
NK002(kha)008:332: gsum pa thugs kyi rjes gnang gi /
NK002(kha)008:333: mdun bskyed kyi lha la mos gus dung dung pa dang /
NK002(kha)008:334: bdag gi rgyud byin gyis brlab tu gsol snyam pa mdzad pas /
NK002(kha)008:335: mdun bskyed kyi lha'i thugs ka nas phreng ba dang
NK002(kha)008:336: pad+ma sogs phyag mtshan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa
NK002(kha)008:337: rgyang gis byon / khyed rang rnams kyi snying ga'i sa bon dang dbyer med du 'dres /
NK002(kha)008:338: rgyud byin gyis brlabs pa'i mos pa mdzod /
NK002(kha)008:339: de dag gis thugs rje chen po bcu gcig zhal
NK002(kha)008:340: dpal mo lugs kyi rjes gnang legs par grub pa
NK002(kha)008:341: / de'i dus su khas blangs pa'i dam tshig rnams tshul bzhin du bsrung bar bya snyam pas /
NK002(kha)008:342: gtso bos ji ltar sogs gsum /
NK002(kha)008:343: rjes gnang zab mo thob pa'i yon tu man+dala /
NK002(kha)008:344: slang yang lus longs spyod dge tshogs rgya mtsho dang
NK002(kha)008:345: bcas pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi 'byor
NK002(kha)008:346: pa ltar sprul nas 'bul na cha shas nas longs
NK002(kha)008:348: deng nas brtsams te bdag bran du /
NK002(kha)008:350: de ltar bsgrubs pa las byung ba'i dge ba thams cad sems can gyi don du bsngo bar mdzod /
NK002(kha)008:351: bsod nams 'di yis sogs bsngosa nas /
NK002(kha)008:354: slob dpon gyis mchod pa kha gsos la mdun bskyed
NK002(kha)008:355: la mchod bstod sngar ltar byas nas 'dod pa'i don
NK002(kha)008:356: la gsol ba btab yig brgya dang /
NK002(kha)008:357: ma rnyed yongs su sogs kyis nongs pa bshags /
NK002(kha)008:359: 'dir ni gzugs dang sogs kyis brtan bzhugs /
NK002(kha)008:361: khyed kyis sems can don sogs kyi mthar /
NK002(kha)008:364: mdun bskyed kyi dam tshig pa rang la bsdu /
NK002(kha)008:365: bdag bskyed kyi zhal phyag rnams kyang rtsa ba'i zhal phyag la bsdus te /
NK002(kha)008:366: rang nyid phyag gnyis pa mchog sbyin dang gser gyi pad+ma 'dzin par bsams la /
NK002(kha)008:367: smon lam dang bkra shis kyis mtha' brgyan nas mchod gtor rnams bsdu'o //
NK002(kha)008:368: spyan ras gzigs dpal mo lugs kyi rjes gnang gi
NK002(kha)008:369: yi ge 'di ni rang gi tsha bo thub ston
NK002(kha)008:370: 'jam dbyangs bsod nams bzang po'i ngor gnyos btsun rmongs
NK002(kha)008:371: pa d+harma sh+r+ais zin bris su spel ba'o //
NK002(kha)008:372: 'di'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
NK002(kha)008:375: pan+di ta zla ba gzhon nu /
NK002(kha)008:376: pan+di ta ye shes bzang po /
NK002(kha)008:388: gnyag dbon bsod nams bzang po /
NK002(kha)008:391: ma ni ba grags pa bsod nams /
NK002(kha)008:395: rje btsun sgrol ba'i mgon po /
NK002(kha)008:398: ston sgom byams pa phun tshogs rnam rgyal /
NK002(kha)008:400: yang na 'phags chen bsod nams dar nas /
NK002(kha)008:408: tre bo chos kyi dbang po /
NK002(kha)008:409: byams pa phun tshogs rnam rgyal /
NK002(kha)008:411: yang na rgyal sras thogs med nas /
NK002(kha)008:414: ngor chen kun dga' bzang po /
NK002(kha)008:415: mus chen dkon mchog rgyal mtshan /
NK002(kha)008:417: go ram pa bsod nams seng ge /
NK002(kha)008:419: mkhan chen chos grags rgya mtsho /
NK002(kha)008:420: mkhan chen blo gros rab yangs /
NK002(kha)008:421: bya btang dkon mchog dbang po /
NK002(kha)008:423: bya rgod pa kun dga' chos lhunah bya rgod pa d+harma war+d+ha /
NK002(kha)008:424: rnal 'byor dbang phyug chos skyong rgyal mtshan /
NK002(kha)008:427: kha rag sgom chen phun tshogs dbang po /
NK002(kha)008:428: grwa thang mkhan chen kun dga' mkhyen rab /
NK002(kha)008:434: rgyal sras gzhan phan mtha' yas /
NK002(kha)008:435: mchog sprul thub bstan rgyal mtshan /
NK002(kha)008:436: de la yig cha'i lung bcas thob /
